summary.span: 提供一个用户界面，用于指示窗体上的某个控件具有与其相关联的错误。

span.span: Provides a user interface for indicating that a control on a form has an error associated with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供了一种简单的机制，该机制向最终用户指示窗体上的控件具有与之关联的错误。 presents a simple mechanism for indicating to the end user that a control on a form has an error associated with it. 如果为控件指定了错误描述字符串，控件旁边会出现一个图标。If an error description string is specified for the control, an icon appears next to the control. 图标按指定的速率按指定的方式闪烁 。The icon flashes in the manner specified by , at the rate specified by . 当鼠标悬停在该图标上时，将显示一个工具提示，其中显示错误描述字符串。When the mouse hovers over the icon, a ToolTip appears showing the error description string. 通常，使用 与数据绑定控件关联。Typically, you use in association with data-bound controls. 将与数据绑定控件一起使用时，必须 在构造函数中指定，也可以通过设置属性来指定 。When using with data-bound controls, you must specify the , either in the constructor or by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 组件不为辅助功能客户端提供内置支持。The component does not provide built-in support for accessibility clients. 若要使应用程序在使用此组件时可访问，你必须提供其他可访问的反馈机制。To make your application accessible when using this component, you must provide an additional, accessible feedback mechanism. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类向用户通知数据输入错误。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 该示例创建一个 ，它包含一个 控件、一个控件 和一个 控件，每个验证其内容，一个 用于每个控件。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 该示例使用 和 属性以及 和方法设置错误图标选项 。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 在 控件事件期间，使用或不使用适当的错误文本调用方法 ，具体取决于控件中的内容。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CPP/errorproviderexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/CS/errorproviderexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ErrorProvider/VB/errorproviderexample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将 和与一起使用 来向用户指示数据错误。The following code example shows how to use the with a and to indicate a data error to the user. [!code-cpp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置错误图标的闪烁速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate at which the error icon flashes.

span.span: The rate, in milliseconds, at which the error icon should flash.
The default is 250 milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 错误图标按指定速率闪烁。The error icon flashes at the specified rate. 如果值为零，则将设置 为 。A value of zero sets to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类向用户通知数据输入错误。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 该示例创建一个 ，它包含一个 控件、一个控件 和一个 控件，每个验证其内容，一个 用于每个控件。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 该示例使用 和 属性以及 和方法设置错误图标选项 。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 在 控件事件期间，使用或不使用适当的错误文本调用方法 ，具体取决于控件中的内容。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个数据源，可以附加到控件并监视是否有错误。The is a data source that you can attach to a control and that you want to monitor for errors. 可以设置为任何实现的集合 。 can be set to any collection that implements . 若要避免在更改和时可能发生的运行时冲突， 应使用 而不是 单独设置。To avoid conflicts at run time that can occur when changing and , you should use instead of setting and individually. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 和与一起使用 来向用户指示数据错误。The following code example shows how to use the with a and to indicate a data error to the user. 此代码假定你已创建并填充了一个名为 `dataSet1` 的，其中包含一个 名为的 `dataTable1` 。This code assumes you have created and populated a named `dataSet1` containing a named `dataTable1`. 将绑定到控件 （如 控件）时，通过对象指定的错误 将在控件中显示为错误标志符号 。When you bind the to a control such as the control, errors specified through objects appear as error glyphs in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ErrorProvider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ErrorProvider Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法在打开文件对话框之前检查是否有错误。The following code example uses the method to check for an error before opening a file dialog box. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的、名为的 `TextBox1` `OpenFileDialog1` 按钮 `Button1` 和 `ErrorProvider1` 名为的的窗体中。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `TextBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, a button named `Button1`, and an named `ErrorProvider1`. 确保所有事件都与事件处理程序相关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetIconPadding(class System.Windows.Forms.Control control) cil managed
Public Function GetIconPadding (control As Control) As Integer

span.span: The control to get the padding for.

summary.span: 返回错误图标旁边保留的额外空间量。

span.span: Returns the amount of extra space to leave next to the error icon.

returns.span: 图标与控件之间保留的像素数。

span.span: The number of pixels to leave between the icon and the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 许多图标在其中心图像周围通常具有额外的空间，因此仅当需要额外空间时才需要填充值。Many icons typically have extra space around their central images, so the padding value is only necessary if additional space is necessary. 填充值可以是正数也可以是负数。Padding values can be positive or negative. 负值导致图标与控件的边缘重叠。Negative values cause the icon to overlap the edge of the control. 默认图标填充为0。The default icon padding is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为获得最佳结果，请使用 16 x 16 像素大小的图标。For best results, use an icon of the size 16 x 16 pixels. 如果需要，将指定的图标的大小调整为 16 x 16 像素。Specified icons are resized to be 16 x 16 pixels, if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRightToLeftChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnRightToLeftChanged (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnRightToLeftChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnRightToLeftChanged : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 "true"，则 "错误" 图标将显示在关联控件的左侧，并且工具提示文本将按从右到左的顺序显示。When this property is set to true, the error icon appears to the left of the associated control and the ToolTip text is displayed in right-to-left order.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RightToLeftChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property changes value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ErrorProvider1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ErrorProvider1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#382](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#382)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#382](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#382)]

span.span: The error description string, or or to remove the error.

summary.span: 设置指定控件的错误描述字符串。

span.span: Sets the error description string for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的长度 `value` 大于零，则显示错误图标，错误图标的工具提示为错误说明文本。If the length of `value` is greater than zero, then the error icon is displayed, and the ToolTip for the error icon is the error description text. 如果长度为零或 `value` 为 `null` ，则将隐藏错误图标。If the length is zero or `value` is `null`, the error icon is hidden. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类向用户通知数据输入错误。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 该示例创建一个 ，它包含一个 控件、一个控件 和一个 控件，每个验证其内容，一个 用于每个控件。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 该示例使用 和 属性以及 和方法设置错误图标选项 。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 在 控件事件期间，使用或不使用适当的错误文本调用方法 ，具体取决于控件中的内容。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control. Public Sub SetIconPadding (control As Control, padding As Integer)

span.span: The to set the padding for.

param.name: padding
param.span: 要在图标与 之间添加的像素数。

span.span: The number of pixels to add between the icon and the .

summary.span: 设置指定控件和错误图标之间应保留的额外空间量。

span.span: Sets the amount of extra space to leave between the specified control and the error icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 许多图标在其中心图像周围通常具有额外的空间，因此仅当需要额外的空间时，才需要填充值。Many icons typically have extra space around their central images, so the padding value is only necessary when additional space is necessary. 填充值可以是正数也可以是负数。Padding values can be positive or negative. 负值导致图标与控件的边缘重叠。Negative values cause the icon to overlap the edge of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类向用户通知数据输入错误。The following code example demonstrates using the class to notify the user of a data entry error. 该示例创建一个 ，它包含一个 控件、一个控件 和一个 控件，每个验证其内容，一个 用于每个控件。The example creates a that contains a control, a control, and a control, each validating its content, and an for each control. 该示例使用 和 属性以及 和方法设置错误图标选项 。The example sets error icon options using the and properties and the and methods. 在 控件事件期间，使用或不使用适当的错误文本调用方法 ，具体取决于控件中的内容。The method is called with or without appropriate error text during a control's event, depending upon the content in the control.
